transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning good morning. Bas bas bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Aapko isliye disturb kiya sir actually pata hai kya wo aapne na wo feedback me na de diya tha ki India mart ne open kar diya apne employee ke liye to usse na fir se wo feedback hi form me open ho gaya ki aapne mujhe no diya hai to main isko nahi nahi aapko jo no nahi diya hai aapko actually aapko no nahi diya hai wo actually kya tha aapko maine bola tha ki aapka proposal mere ko bhejo theek hai wo proposal maine reject kiya hai wo reject reject karne ka reason ye hai ki aapko proposal kahan bheja hai sir mere ko proposal aagya aapka isliye wo proposal reject kiya hai kahan kon sa proposal sir maine abhi aapko bheja hi nahi koi proposal are wo aagya isliye to aapka main aapko photo bhejta hu aapko dekho aap uska kya usme kya discount kya aaya hoga performa ka aaya hoga wo performa wo mujhe nahi maine aapko kya bola tha ki aap mere ko aapka proposal bhejo main ye november end se pehle main set kar dunga theek hai aapka proposal usme koi discount hai nahi aur usme ek aapka jo discount tha theek hai aapka jo banda maine mana kiya tha aapko uske liye maine phone kiya tha yaad hai ki bhai mere ko harassment mat karna abhi theek hai wo banda mere ko 10000 bolta hai aapne bola yahan pe kuch proposal me mere ko kuch discount diya nahi suno suno meri baat suno main main photo bhi bhejta hu sir to usme pata chalega ek photo ke andar likha tha 6000 theek hai wo sab me hota hai ek me nahi hota hai wo aapka jo brochures hota hai na uske upar likha tha abhi aap hi samajh lo mere ko agar wo banda bol ke aisa dikkat yahan pe aati hai madam abhi aap samjhe mere ko verbally aise bolta hai ki 10000 ka discount hai fir jab likha hua hota hai to usme kuch discount nahi hota hai yahi cheez hoti hai jiski vajah se mere ko dikkat hai aap jo ha isliye aur kuch nahi hai aap dekho aapka proposal bhejo agar sahi hai to main to november se pehle main aapka payment kar dunga mere ko koi dikkat ki baat nahi hai aur aapka proposal sahi hona chahiye aisa nahi pura kuch likha kuch sahi aap samajh rahe ho madam kya bol raha hu main automated ha wo original price ka system automated tha abhi main aapko share kar rahi hu 15 minute kyuki actually kya tha na aapne wo export ka bola tha to main wait kar rahi thi ek bar export ka pura proper detail leke aapko share karu but abhi main aapko mera ek saal ka wo aagya ek saal ka wo ha ek saal ka jo tha na wo aaya ek saal ka mere ko bhejo ek saal do saal jo bhi hai teen saal ka nahi kar raha hai ek saal ka bhejo kya hai main dekhta hu abhi aage aur uska export ka mere ko bhejo theek hai theek hai pehle main aapko closing bejti hu aur close kar rahi hu ticket ko aap please is bar yes de dena kyuki wo mere against aa raha hai wo theek hai acha ok main aapko share kar rahi hu ok actually aapko no bheja hi nahi tha wo no jo tha actually aapko bheja hi nahi tha wo proposal aaya tha na wo dekha tha uske upar against wo mere ko reject kiya tha aapko nahi kiya tha theek hai ha sir wo but ticket pe na employee related chala jata hai to main usko fir aapke waha pe wo data ha theek hai main dekh leta hu theek hai sir to main ek bar dekh leti hu
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received negative feedback regarding employee access.

- Customer states they did not send proposal.

- Customer is concerned about discount discrepancies.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the feedback issue.

- Executive explained the proposal rejection reason.

- Executive will review the customer's data.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will resend the proposal.

- Executive will review the proposal and export details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- proposal, discount, export, feedback, payment
